Warnings.info: Make sure to upload the crash report rather than sending a screenshot of the launcher.

Solutions.info: If you use a Microsoft account, enable multiplayer. You should be able to do so from https://account.xbox.com/en-us/Settings under the Xbox One/Windows 10 Online Safety tab. If you are under 18, you may need a parent or guardian to help by getting them to create a family and add you to it. From there, they should be able to enable multiplayer for your account.
The Essential Backend is down and a file is failing to download. Please try again in 5 Minutes

and.value: Caused by: org.spongepowered.asm.mixin.transformer.throwables.InvalidMixinException: Unexpecteded NoSuchElementException whilst applying the mixin class: null

Solutions.info: Essential Bug, Fixed in next version. Delete .minecraft/skyclient/essential/onboarding.json

Solutions.info: Update Skyclient Cosmetics
Essential Backend might be down for "Unplanned Maintanance." Try again in a few Minutes.
Update patcher to 1.6+
One or more of your mods has not been reobfuscated properly. Ask the developer of the mod to fix this issue.
Change your connected textures to fast. (Options > Video Settings > Quality > Connected Textures)
Don't hold F3+C
XanderLib encountered an issue whilst installing. Try to update mods that use it. (e.g. EvergreenHUD)
Danker's Skyblock Mod experienced an issue. Make sure it is up to date.
Your GPU appears to be too old for some rendering options in Minecraft. There is no way to fix this other than upgrading your PC.
Essential issue. Get support on Sk1er's support server https://discord.gg/WqkdC8XbVe
Failed to connect to Skyclient Cosmetics API
Dont use "Debug Display Tags" in Skyclient Cosmetics settings (This is Debug feature for a reason)
Update Skyclient Cosmetics

Solutions.info: Likely an issue with SkyblockCatia. This mod has been known to be incompatible with some mods and it is recommended you remove it.
Delete the 'modcore' folder in your .minecraft folder.
SkyblockAddons is encountering problems. Get support [here](https://discord.gg/PqTAEek) and remove it in the meantime.
Sk1er API appears to be down. Please wait until the issue is resolved.

Solutions.info: You either have multiple optifine jars in your mods folder or it is corrupted.
Essential is not compatible with OpenJ9, Remove OpenJ9 if you want to use it.

You are using an old Forge version. Mods may depend on this to function properly. Please update it [here](https://maven.minecraftforge.net/net/minecraftforge/forge/1.8.9-11.15.1.2318-1.8.9/forge-1.8.9-11.15.1.2318-1.8.9-installer.jar)
Java has appeared to crash. You can most likely ignore this crash if it doesn't happen again.

EvergreenHUD appears to be outdated. [Update here](https://github.com/isXander/EvergreenHUD/releases)
One of your mods tried to render something incorrectly. Make sure it is up to date.

Essential appears to be experiencing issues while downloading. Please be patient while the issue are resolved.
Looks like you are having internet problems. Make sure your internet connection is stable!
Update Sk1er's Old Animations Mod https://discord.gg/d4KFR9H (beta discord)

Wyvilities messed up name hightlight. Update Wyvtilities.

Issue with Essential. Contact Sk1er Support https://discord.gg/WqkdC8XbVe

and.value: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Could not initialize class gg.essential.api.EssentialAPI

Solutions.info: Looks like you have two patcher mods installed. Please remove the old one.

and.value: Caused by: java.lang.ClassFormatError: Duplicate field name&signature in class file net/minecraft/client/gui/GuiChat

Solutions.info: This is caused by a random Java process being there when it shouldn't. Restart your computer, or use task manager to close it.
Delete `.minecraft/versions/1.8.9/1.8.9.jar`

Recommendations.info: One or more of your mods are obfuscated (probably SBE). This is very bad and you should not use them.

You are using SkyblockExtras. It is highly recommended that you remove it due to incompatibilities with other mods. As well as this, it breaks the [Minecraft EULA](https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula) AND the developer is know to have done some pretty bad things. Find alternatives [here](https://proudmuslim.tech/bad-mod-alternatives/sbe.html).
You are using BetterFps. It has been known to get you banned and to cause visual glitches. Consider [Sk1er's Patcher](https://sk1er.club/mods/patcher) if you don't have it already.
You are using the OpenJ9 JVM. This has been known to cause issues even though it uses less memory. To use the alternative, Hotspot, you will have to [re-install Java](https://adoptopenjdk.net/).

and.value: Java VM Version: Eclipse OpenJ9 VM

Recommendations.info: You are using a custom version of Forge. Forks such as Asbyth Forge have been known to cause issues with mods and is not recommended, even by the developer.
Windows 7 is no longer supported by Microsoft. Please upgrade to Windows 10/Linux.
HUDCaching has been replaced by Patcher 1.6. Please remove it.
